snippet.title: Stronghold: Warlords - Gamescom 2020 Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/907650/Stronghold_Warlords

As shown during the Gamescom Studio show presented by IGN, Firefly Studios has given the world a first look at Stronghold: Warlords' Japanese campaign missions following Toyotomi Hideyoshi. This new developer commentary footage shows details on the new ‘Warlord System’ and gives a closer look at new units coming to the game, when Stronghold: Warlords releases on January 26th, 2021.

While the base game will be made available on Steam for $39.99, €34.99 or £29.99, Stronghold: Warlords will also be purchasable as a digital Special Edition. The Stronghold: Warlords Special Edition package contains:

• Stronghold: Warlords Base Game
• Stronghold HD on Steam
• Full Stronghold: Warlords Soundtrack (Composed by Robert Euvino)
• 'Art of Warlords' Digital Art Book
• Feature-Length 'Making Of' Stronghold: Warlords Documentary

Including developer interviews and behind the scenes footage from the last three years of development, the Warlords Documentary provides an honest look at modern indie game development at a small studio during a global pandemic. The Warlords art book and soundtrack will contain high quality source material from Firefly Studios artists and Stronghold series composer Robert Euvino. As an added bonus Special Edition owners will also receive a copy of Stronghold HD on Steam. Stronghold: Warlords' Special Edition will cost $49.99 USD, €44.99 or £39.99

0:00 - Intro
1:00 - Castle Sim
1:46 - Warlords System
3:03 - Siege Combat
4:06 - Outro
4:44 - Special Edition

Official Website - http://www.StrongholdWarlords.com/

#StrongholdWarlords #Simulation #Historical
